kizuna_rival_a_02:
Great timing! I’ve been having the hardest time
lining up opponents to battle![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_a_03:
But now I found you—in the schoolyard, no less!
It’d be silly NOT to battle! Whaddya say?[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_a_04a: I knew I could count on you![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_a_04b:
Pfft, haha! You kidder, pretending like you’re not
itching to battle! C’mon, let’s get down to it.[npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_a_system_01:
You spent two whole hours battling Pokémon
with Nemona!
kizuna_rival_a_06:
Gotta step up my game so I’ll be ready anytime
for that Academy Ace Tournament![npcn:4]
kizuna_rival_a_07:
I know I sprang my battle fever on you out of
nowhere. Thanks for being up for it![npcn:4]
